attributes.action: British-born council house seekers on waiting list shouid take preference over immnigrants
attributes.additional_details: I have paid over £5 million pounds in tax io Britaiin till my firm went into liqidation after 25 yrs. Since then I have been in squalid rented accomadation. Over the past five years I have bid monthly for permanent housing with no success! Under the freedom of information act  I have obtained information that over 70% of successful applicants have been given to newly arrived immigrants who have just arrived and jumped the queue, Why should immigrants from China, Indisa etc who have contributed nothing jump the housing list ?
